main event: A civilian observed an unidentified flying object shaped like a flat cylinder while driving near Festus, Missouri.
interesting points: The object was first observed as yellowish-white, then turned grayish-white, and finally glowing white.,The witness described the object as resembling a large picnic plate in appearance.,The sighting lasted for 55 seconds while traveling at 55 mph.,There was no discernible sound or visible exhaust from the object.,The report includes a suggestion that the observed phenomenon may have been a reflection from debris.
